verses.name: Exodus 7:22
verses.text: And the magicians of Egypt did so with their enchantments: and Pharaoh’s heart was hardened, neither did he hearken unto them; as the Lord had said.

verses.name: Exodus 7:23
verses.text: And Pharaoh turned and went into his house, neither did he set his heart to this also.

verses.name: Exodus 7:24
verses.text: And all the Egyptians digged round about the river for water to drink; for they could not drink of the water of the river.

verses.name: Exodus 7:25
verses.text: And seven days were fulfilled, after that the Lord had smitten the river.
